page.title: 04MY MAY DAY HOLIDAY,1985
page.content: We planned to go{camping}but it was'nt very nice so we cancelled it. Saturday morning and I went to see the horses at the farm and I later rode{Dazzler,}(my horse). After I had finished my ride I helped my mother to paint our fence. On Sunday I finished painting the fence and afterwards I played on my bicycle. On Monday I went to the park and then I went to see the{horses}again.I then played in the street on my {rollerskates}and played a street game called{Wakey,Wakey, Sleepyhead.}After that I had steak for tea and listened {to'Wham Make It Big}on my record player{.'Wham!'}are my favourite pop group. At{10.30pm}I slumped into bed and thought about my{May Day holiday.
